dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface ContextItem

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, XMLSerializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContextItem, AbstractRestContextItem, GenericEntity, GenericRestEntity, Location, Person, Place, RestLocation, RestPerson, RestPlace
public interface ContextItem
extends XMLSerializable

This interface defines a context item -- i.e. an item stored in an entity's context. This interface has to be implemented for specific item like location, activity, status, temperature, etc.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

isSecure

boolean isSecure()
Returns:
if this item is secure, i.e. if the monitor who delivered this item was verified as secure.

setSecure

void setSecure(boolean secure)
Set this Context Item to be secure. Is done by the setSecureContextItem method

getAccuracy

double getAccuracy()
Return the accuracy of this context attribute as a double between 0 and 1. 1 is highly accurate (exact) and 0 is in-accurate (undeterminable).

Returns:
A double within [0..1]

equals

boolean equals(ContextItem anotherItem)
Compare this ContextItem with another ContextItem. Returns true, if they are equal .

Parameters:
anotherItem - The other ContextItem to compare this Item with
Returns:
true if the this Item is equal to anotherItem.
